channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin in Hatherley park completely over stuffed, 6th November
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous edge outside 12 Tennyson Road, 6th November
item.description:
The dangerous edge outside 12 Tennyson Road nearly put the old lady who lives at number 12 in hospital. Can we get the holes either side of the paving slabs filled in please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Section of roundabout lights out, 4th November
item.description:
Hi, the section by Unilever ver and other side by Sainsburys all the street lights are out on carriageway as you come up to roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Corinium Avenue, Barnwood

item.title: Road markings wearing off, 3rd November
item.description:
The writing at the junction which says right turn only with an arrow has started to wear away. Most people seem to ignore this anyway which is another issue. Maybe re paint it in bright yellow?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Zoons Court Roundabout, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pallets left ready for having a fire below the tree, 2nd November
item.description:
